name: Beautiful Bastide in a French Village
description:
DESCRIPTION
If you are looking for a breathtaking venue, the French Bastide is the best place! Set high up in the exquisite village, in one of the most beautiful areas of France, The Beautiful Bastide looks out over the green hills of the Luberon. This former stately home is filled with French history, good taste and sophistication, making it an ideal environment to hold a wedding is – and create a day that is guaranteed to take your breath away.
On the terrace or in the suspended gardens, you enjoy an astonishing view over the Luberon valley and the Alpilles. In communion with nature, under the radiant sun of the region, you dive into the Provençal lifestyle. With a sumptuous decor, Beautiful Bastide shows all the beauty of the XVII century. The 34 rooms and 6 Suites bear a timeless Provençal theme.
Each room is unique and comes with all the comfort of a modern and luxurious recently renovated property.
For a memorable experience, you can privatize this Beautiful Bastide. Otherwise, we offer a partial privatization of our reception areas and gardens with 8 rooms in the adjacent building.
We will design for you and with you, the best wedding celebration in order to create a unique experience for your D-Day.
Thanks to our Chef and our Sommelier, you will be accompanied to define the perfect menu and wines pairing. We offer a refined traditional cuisine using the best local and regional Mediterranean products.
Getting married at this Beautiful Bastide is to a unique experience worthy of a unique day. Here, the French art of living is brought to the fore, ensuring both the bride and groom as well as the guests find delight around every corner and in each mouthful. On Sunday, a sumptuous brunch means guests can feast on sweet and savoury delicacies prepared by the hotel's chefs. Soothe tired muscles in the Spa, enjoy exceptional cocktails in the hotel bar and dine in the gourmet restaurants.
This French typical Bastide represents the best of French savoir-vivre and its hospitality excellence. Your celebration there is the opportunity to enjoy a friendly and luxurious reception while offering accommodation to your guests. The 34 rooms and 6 Suites invite you on a journey through time. The Provencal theme comes in several tones, each room is unique. Offering a view over the alleys of the village or the majestic Luberon valley, our rooms and Suites offer absolute comfort.
Capacity:
• Up to 120 guests for a seated dinner
• Up to 180 guests for a cocktail
• Accommodation up to 90 guests
Our team is at your entire disposal to create your tailor-made wedding. From the flowers to the entertainment, the drinks and the decor – the team wants you to express your love in the most personal and beautiful way possible. Do not hesitate to come and visit us, we will be delighted to welcome you!
A bientôt !
